ABOUT US
Castaway’s Sports Bar & Grill
Singer Island, Florida
ORDER NOW
Our
Story
Discover the ultimate dining experience at Castaway’s Sports Bar & Grill, nestled in the heart of Singer Island. Indulge in a culinary journey curated by our passionate team, led by the visionary restaurateur, Andrew Fontaine. With a commitment to culinary excellence and a love for our community, Castaway’s is not just another chain restaurant – it’s a testament to Fontaine’s lifelong dream of bringing exceptional dining to his hometown.
Where we are today
At Castaway’s, we go beyond mere satisfaction; we aim to be the go-to destination for all discerning palates on Singer Island. Whether you crave artisanal pizzas, mouthwatering burgers, succulent wings, or a refreshing array of ice-cold beers, our menu boasts over 40 selections to tantalize your taste buds. More than just a dining spot, Castaway’s is a haven for families and friends alike, offering a warm and welcoming atmosphere where unforgettable memories are made.
Join us at Castaway’s Sports Bar & Grill and embark on a voyage of flavors, festivities, and fun. Discover why we’ve earned the title of Singer Island’s premier dining destination, where every visit promises good times and great tastes.
GOOD FOOD
LIVE MUSIC
GREAT TIMES
AMAZING DRINKS
EXPERIENCES MADE
WITH LOVE DAILY
I was looking for hush puppies so I went here. So glad I came here because they were so delicious. Fries and grouper basket were so flavorful. Finished with a scoop of ice cream. Definitely give this place a try. Great food and atmosphere. Great service as well.
